name: Crepe
ingredients: A forth of a teaspoon salt
A forth of a cup butter, melted

steps.1: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour and the eggs. Gradually add in the milk, stirring to combine. Add the salt and butter, beat until smooth.
steps.2: Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately one forth of a cup for each crepe. Tilt the pan with a circular motion so that the batter coats the surface evenly.
steps.3: Cook the crepe for about 2 minutes, until the bottom is light brown. Loosen with a spatula, turn and cook the other side.
steps.4: Repeat until you're out of batter
